name: sbijax
description: implements several methods for simulation-based inference

name: surjectors
description: is a library for density estimation using surjective normalizing flows

name: reconcile
description: is another Python package for probabilistic reconciliation of time series forecasts

name: Ramsey
description: is a Python package for probabilistic modelling using JAX and Haiku. It implements recent developments in probabilistic machine and deep learning and among other things aims to bring these methods to a larger audience

name: clad
description: is a proof-of-concept reverse-mode automatic differentiation package written in Clojure

name: shm
description: is a Python package for probabilistic inference in structured hierarchical models

name: R--
description: is an interpreter for the R language written in C++

name: netReg
description: implements network-regularized regression models in R/C++

name: cuda-etudes
description: is a selection of numerical CUDA recipes

name: cluedo
description: implements the well known board game in JavaScript. This version plays in ancient Greece where Socrates, a true champion of the open society, has been murdered by one of his enemies

name: PyBDA
description: is a Python library and command line tool for big data analytics and machine learning scaling to tera byte sized data sets
